ygData.subject: Rebreathers...
ygData.msgSnippet: Dont forget to do a /feedback and tell Verant they need to reduce the weigh of the lungs and rebreathers. As I figured, after I maxed on stalking probes at
ygData.messageBody:
Dont forget to do a "/feedback" and tell Verant they need to reduce the weigh of the lungs and rebreathers.

As I figured, after I maxed on stalking probes at 102, I had to cycle about 40,000 plat thru the skill to get to the point where rebreathers can be made with a tolerable success rate.

My skill is 127 at the moment and my success rate for rebreathers is 1 out of 3. I am trying to sell them for 3250 on tunare.

Cheers FizzWizz

P.S. To the guy that asked where all the component are for the lungs and rebreathers, check in the back of the necro guild in akanon, you should find a vendor in there somewhere...heh-heh...
